This game is pure....you know what I'd say if I could. 

Valve fixed actually nothing the players asked for! "You got a problem with hackers? Who cares. This game is toxic af? Who cares. You want more operations and not like 5 years apart? Who cares. Oh wait, the operation-thing we could make possible, cause we'll get money from it." - Valve

I've played it for so long now, had quite a huge break but wanted to give it another try and grind myself up to GE. Thats really not possible, if you get into the wrong lobbies at least. Getting kicked for being the only solo-player in the round is just one thing.

Just do something Valve or else just disappoint more and more.

Letztes Ranz-Game eine schande das zu spielen. Die halbe Zeit funktioniert dieses Spiel nicht die Matchmaking-Team zusammenstellung ist völlig random und unergründlich. Man wird oft permanent gebannt wenn ein Hacker im Team war, obwohl die Teammitglieder nichts mit zu tun hatten.

Meilleur Fps que j'ai jamais jouer malgré les graphisme peu récent mais le jeu est toujours aussi bien à jouer aujourd'hui je conseille surtout qu'il est gratuit malgré le nombre de tricheurs excessif
Welcome to CS:GO, now you're here forever.

csgo is pretty fun with friends but i wish it would get it's optimization back like it had a few years ago, I'm not sure what happened but this game tends to be very unoptimized now in days which does suck. that's really my only complaint other than that this game is fun and I'd recommend it.
Очень много читеров,много оставленных нервов, никакие вак системы нихера не работают.
